predicate.note: Frames file for 'cram' based on sentences in financial subcorpus and automatic expansion via verbnet.

example.name: canonical form
example.text: Unveiled last April, the chip crams 1.2 million transistors on a sliver of silicon, more than four times as many as on Intel's earlier model, 80386.
example.arg: more than four times as many as on Intel 's earlier model , 80386

example.name: unstated args
example.text: About 30 floor traders crammed near the UAL post most of the day...
example.note: There are default args being used here: arg1 is presumably "themselves" and arg2 is something like "the area".

example.name: intransitive
example.text: John crammed for his linguistics exam.

example.name: with subject
example.text: John crammed Levin classes for his linguistics exam.
